name: Daunting Smite
simple_desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single enemy, with a chance of Freezing them.
desc:
Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy, with a #2[i]% base chance to Freeze the enemy for #3[i] turn(s).
While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Ice Additional DMG equal to #4[i]% of Gepard's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
